column1: Orange Chicken@Dinner@1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
2. Add the chicken to the hot pan

column3: and honey to the chicken and stir to combine.

column1: 4. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 8-10 minutes
5. Add the orange marmalade and cook for an additional 3-5 minutes
column2: or until the sauce is thickened.

column1: 6. Garnish with sliced oranges and serve.$
2. Grease a baking sheet with oil.
3. Cut orange into thin slices and lay them on the baking sheet.
4. Place chicken breasts in another baking sheet.
5. Brush chicken with vegetable oil and season with salt and pepper.
6. Place baking sheet with chicken into preheated oven and bake for 25 minutes.
7. Take the baking sheet with orange and place it in the oven for 10 minutes.
8. Serve orange slices with the cooked chicken. Enjoy!$
